alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 12:40PM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following bayou in Louisiana... Bodcau Bayou At Bayou Bodcau Lake affecting Bossier and Webster Parishes. For the Bodcau Bayou...including Bayou Bodcau Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bodcau Bayou At Bayou Bodcau Lake. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Wednesday the pool stage was 174.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum lake pool stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:00 PM CDT Wednesday was 174.7 feet. - Forecast...The bayou is expected to remain steady above flood pool stage at 174.5 feet. - Flood pool stage is 172.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 175.0 feet on 05/29/1968. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 1245 PM CDT.
